title: Pernament champiom
body: Incidentally, I'm Kha zix shard swapped at random pernament champ  . can i  get back kha zix ?

replies.body: If I understand correctly, a wanted shard was accidentally used to reroll?  That sucks.  :(  I'm not sure if we can help because there is a confirmation window, but we can certainly take a look to see.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do.  See you there!
